Isaiah Thomas

Isaiah Jamar Thomas ▪ Instagram: isaiahthomas

(King in the Fourth, Pizza Guy)

Position: Point Guard and Shooting Guard ▪ Shoots: Left

5-9, 185lb (175cm, 83kg)

Born: February 7, 1989 in Tacoma, Washington us

College: Washington

High School: South Kent School in South Kent, Connecticut

Draft: Sacramento Kings, 2nd round (30th pick, 60th overall), 2011 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: December 26, 2011

Experience: 12 years

  • 2x All Star
  • 2016-17 All-NBA
  • 2011-12 All-Rookie
